description:
On long bike touring trips, having panniers up front gives you a bit more storage without being too big and heavy. These smaller panniers have the same durability and reliability than Ortlieb's bigger options. The waterproof fabric, combined with the roll-top closure, makes makes them dependable riging companions to keep your gear dry on wet commutes or the inevitable rainy days when you're touring.

  • PVC-coated polyester and PU coated nylon is completely waterproof
  • QL2.1 fixing system is easy to install and remove from your rack
  • Fixing system is adjustable to fit your bike rack
  • IP64 waterproof rating makes them perfect for rainy weather
  • Shoulder strap provides carrying comfort off the bike
  • Works on racks with tubes 16, 12, 10 and 8mm in diameter
  • 3M Scotchlite reflective patch keeps you visible
  • Edge protector prevent premature wear
  • Capacity is 12.5L per pannier. Max load is 9kg per pannier
  • Sold as a pair
name: Ortlieb Sport-Roller Classic Pannier
